name: Carbonara
steps: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Chop the garlic cloves and drain the chickpeas.
Fry the chickpeas in a pan and season them with soy sauce and liquid smoke.
Add the garlic, crumbled vegetable stock cube, parmesan, oat cream, and black pepper to the pan and fry for a while longer.
Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce.
Garnish the dish with parmesan and black pepper.
